title: Wii U emulator (almost) runs 'Mario Kart 8' on your PC
text:
Wii U emulator (almost) runs 'Mario Kart 8' on your PC 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Want a Wii U but don't want to own Nintendo's latest console? That's sort of possible now. I emphasize the "sort of" because the recently re...
